title: Music Player
text: Simple music player, displaying playlist and current playing song in seperate areas. Songs can be played randomly or in loop while pausing and adjusting time and volume.

title: Tourplanner
text: App to plan tours was built with C# in a layer-based architecture meanwhile the UI was implemented via WPF. It enables to create tours with some information, multiple logs for a single tour and a graphical visualization.

title: ToDo-List
text: Mini web-project for a tool: the todo-list. Tasks can be entered via the input field by clicking the 'add'-button or hit enter key. Created tasks or whole list can be removed or highlighted as done by clicking on the entry itself.

title: Game
text: Mini web-project for a game user vs. random-generator. The user can choose a 'figure' and play against random choice. A counter shows the score of user and the system and additionally a message for win, loose or draw is shown after each game play.

title: Rating
text: Mini web-project to take a rating from 1 to 5 stars. Rating can be done by clicking on a star from left to right which fill up the stars with color (white equals not selected).

title: Tik Tak
text: Mini web-project to show the current time of your time-zone and date.

title: Stopwatch
text: Mini web-project to stop the time you take to do anything. For a simple logic the user can start the timer, pause it and reset.
